menu.label: Blog
menu.title: Blog
menu.description: Thoughts and tutorials on development and geospatial tech.

posts.title: Getting Started with React Router
posts.excerpt: Learn怎麼set up and use React Router for seamless navigation in your web applications.
posts.content: This tutorial covers the basics of React Router, including setting up routes, handling navigation, and creating dynamic links. You’ll learn how to use `BrowserRouter`, `Routes`, `Route`, and `useNavigate` to build a single-page application with smooth transitions. Examples include a portfolio site navigation system and best practices for accessibility.

posts.title: Geospatial Data with Leaflet
posts.excerpt: A tutorial on visualizing geospatial data using the Leaflet JavaScript library.
posts.content: This post dives into using Leaflet to create interactive maps for geospatial data visualization. Topics include setting up a Leaflet map, adding markers, layers, and popups, and integrating with geospatial datasets. The tutorial includes a step-by-step guide to building a city temperature heatmap.

menu.label: About
menu.title: Guilherme Viegas
menu.tagline: Data Scientist | Geospatial Analyst | AI Enthusiast
menu.description: I transform complex data into actionable insights through advanced analytics and machine learning. With expertise in econometrics and spatial analysis, I build solutions that help organizations make data-driven decisions. My approach combines technical rigor with clear communication to bridge the gap between data science and business strategy.

items.title: Senior Data Scientist - Tech Solutions Inc.
items.description: Leading spatial analytics projects and developing machine learning models for urban planning applications.

items.title: Data Analyst - GeoAnalytics Corp
items.description: Built econometric models for real estate valuation and developed automated reporting systems.

items.title: Research Assistant - University of Data Science
items.description: Conducted research on spatial econometrics and published papers on novel geostatistical methods.

sections.title: Education & Certifications
items: MSc in Data Science - University of Data Science (2018)
BSc in Economics - Federal University of Analytics (2016)
Google Professional Data Engineer Certification
AWS Certified Machine Learning Specialty

sections.title: Methodological Approach
sections.content: My work follows a rigorous analytical process: 1) Problem framing with stakeholders, 2) Exploratory data analysis, 3) Model development with validation, 4) Implementation strategy, and 5) Continuous monitoring. I emphasize reproducibility through version control and documentation, ensuring insights stand up to scrutiny.

sections.title: Recent Projects
items: Developed a spatial prediction model for urban growth patterns with 92% accuracy
Created an automated ETL pipeline processing 1TB+ of geospatial data daily
Built a real-time dashboard for COVID-19 impact analysis used by government agencies
Implemented a machine learning system reducing operational costs by 30% for a logistics company
